####Introduction to Statistics and Data Analysis

1. Find the sample mean and median of the following list of hours:

   123, 116, 122, 110, 175, 126, 125, 111, 118, 117
   
```{r}
hours <- c(123, 116, 122, 110, 175, 126, 125, 111, 118, 117)
mean(hours)
median(hours)
